## Data (using Riga as an example)

Example of data set for the first days in Riga.

```{r}
casos %>% filter(NombreUnidadTerritorial == 'Rīga') %>% head()
```

We can see the rate of cases per 100 thousand people through the time.

```{r}
casos %>% 
  filter(NombreUnidadTerritorial == 'Rīga') %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Fecha, y = tasa_confirmados)) +
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title = 'Número de casos x100 mil habitantes (Riga)') + 
  ylab('# Casos / 1e6 hab')

```
